snippet: Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, Iran’s supreme leader, dismissed last week’s protest over the country’s plummeting currency as an anomaly that the West had misinterpreted as a harbinger of crisis.
abstract: Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, Iran’s supreme leader, dismisses protests over country’s plummeting currency as anomaly that the West has misinterpreted as harbinger of crisis; exhorts Iranians not to fear intensifying regimen of Western sanctions over Iran’s nuclear program.
lead_paragraph: Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, Iran’s supreme leader, dismissed last week’s protest over the country’s plummeting currency as an anomaly that the West had misinterpreted as a harbinger of crisis.

headline.seo: Ayatollah Khamenei Plays Down Rial Protest
headline.main: West Is Foolish to Celebrate Iran’s Rial Crisis, Ayatollah Says
headline.print_headline: West Is Foolish to Celebrate Iran’s Currency Crisis, Ayatollah Says
